Question
========
Which of the following is an example of a mixed design?

Answerlist
----------
* An investigation of the effect that an employee's gender has on the age
  of attaining a senior management position
* None of the other answers describes a mixed design
* An investigation of the effect that the gender of an accountant has on
  month's-end reporting errors among accountants that followed training
  and accountants that did not follow training
* An investigation of the effect that gender of employees has on choice of
  training programme adopted.

Solution
========





There are no repeated measurement in this design.  
(An employee can either follow or not follow the training not both. In
this case, there is a 2-way ANOVA but not a repeated measures design.)
